artStyle: simple cartoon style, childlike, doodle, bold black outlines, bright flat color

start.text: You wake up in a mysterious forest. The trees tower above you, their leaves rustling in the gentle breeze. A path splits in two directions ahead of you.
start.image-text: A person standing at a fork in a mystical forest path, tall ancient trees, dappled sunlight

choices.text: Take the left path toward the sound of water
Take the right path toward the distant mountains

river_path.text: You follow the sound of rushing water and discover a beautiful crystal-clear river. A small wooden boat is tied to a dock nearby. The current looks unpredictable - you'll need to test your luck to see what happens next!
river_path.image-text: A crystal clear river with a small wooden boat at a rustic dock, surrounded by lush forest

roll.text: ðŸŽ² Roll the dice to see what the river brings!

outcomes.text: The current is too strong! You're swept downstream rapidly.
Perfect conditions! You have a peaceful boat ride.
You notice something glittering in the shallow water.

mountain_path.text: The mountain path is steep but rewarding. As you climb higher, you spot a cave entrance carved with ancient symbols.
mountain_path.image-text: A mountain path leading to a cave entrance with mysterious ancient symbols carved into the rock

boat_journey.text: The boat carries you gently downstream. You pass under a natural stone bridge and see a village in the distance with smoke rising from chimneys.
boat_journey.image-text: View from a boat on a river approaching a quaint village with stone bridge and chimney smoke

riverbank_walk.text: Walking along the riverbank, you discover colorful flowers that seem to glow with their own inner light. A friendly fox approaches you curiously.
riverbank_walk.image-text: A riverbank with glowing magical flowers and a curious red fox approaching peacefully

choices.text: Follow the fox deeper into the forest
Pick some of the glowing flowers

ancient_cave.text: Inside the cave, you find walls covered in glowing crystals that illuminate ancient paintings telling stories of long-lost civilizations.
ancient_cave.image-text: Inside a cave with glowing crystals on walls and ancient cave paintings depicting civilizations

mountain_summit.text: At the summit, you're rewarded with a breathtaking view of the entire realm. You can see the forest, river, village, and distant lands beyond.
mountain_summit.image-text: Panoramic view from mountain summit showing forest, river, village and distant magical lands

choices.text: Look for a way down the other side

friendly_village.text: The villagers welcome you warmly and share stories of their peaceful life by the river. They offer you a place to stay and rest.
friendly_village.image-text: Friendly villagers welcoming a traveler in a cozy riverside village with warm lighting

peaceful_ending.text: You've found a place of peace and contentment. Whether by the river village or atop the mountain, you've discovered that sometimes the journey itself is the greatest treasure.
peaceful_ending.image-text: A serene scene showing contentment and peace, either village life or mountain tranquility

rapid_current.text: The strong current carries you swiftly downstream! You hold on tight as the boat bounces through small rapids. Eventually, you wash up on a sandy shore near a hidden grove.
rapid_current.image-text: A person in a boat being carried by strong river currents through rapids toward a hidden grove

magic_flowers.text: You carefully pick the glowing flowers. They pulse with a warm, magical light in your hands. These could be useful later!
magic_flowers.image-text: Hands holding glowing magical flowers that pulse with warm light

crystal_power.text: You collect several glowing crystals. They feel warm and seem to hum with ancient energy.
crystal_power.image-text: Hands holding glowing crystals that emit ancient magical energy

ancient_wisdom.text: The paintings tell of an ancient ritual. You memorize the symbols - this knowledge might prove valuable.
ancient_wisdom.image-text: Ancient cave paintings showing mystical symbols and ritual scenes

fox_guide.text: The fox leads you to a hidden clearing where an old hermit sits by a fire. He looks at your items with interest.
fox_guide.image-text: A fox leading to a clearing with an old hermit by a campfire

hermit_meeting.text: The hermit smiles. 'I see you've gathered some interesting items on your journey. I can help you, but only if you have something magical.'
hermit_meeting.image-text: An old wise hermit examining magical items by firelight

hermit_flowers.text: The hermit's eyes light up. 'Ah, the flowers of eternal spring! With these, I can brew a potion of courage for you.'
hermit_flowers.image-text: Hermit brewing a magical potion with glowing flowers

hermit_crystals.text: The hermit nods approvingly. 'These crystals hold the power of the earth itself. I can forge them into a protective amulet.'
hermit_crystals.image-text: Hermit crafting a magical amulet from glowing crystals

hermit_wisdom.text: The hermit listens intently. 'The ancient knowledge you've gained is more valuable than any treasure. You are truly wise.'
hermit_wisdom.image-text: Hermit and traveler sharing wisdom by firelight

hermit_disappointed.text: The hermit shakes his head sadly. 'Without something magical to offer, I cannot help you. Perhaps explore more before returning.'
hermit_disappointed.image-text: Disappointed hermit by a dying campfire

new_adventure.text: As you descend the other side of the mountain, you realize this is just the beginning of a much larger adventure. The path ahead leads to unknown wonders.
new_adventure.image-text: A path leading down from mountains toward new unexplored lands full of mystery and wonder
